events.message: I reported the car accident that occurred yesterday at the intersection with detailed information about the collision and damages to my vehicle.
The claim has been categorised as an auto accident claim based on the information provided by the policyholder regarding the vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to manage the claim and assist the customer with the next steps in the vehicle accident process.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim concerning the auto collision and will be processing it with priority to expedite resolution.
Please submit all relevant documents including the police report, photos of damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to proceed with the claim.
The policyholder has submitted all requested documents, including official police report and mechanic’s damage assessment for review.
Our claims team has begun a thorough investigation into the details of the auto accident, reviewing submitted evidence and vehicle condition.
The investigation regarding the vehicle collision is complete; findings have been documented, and the claim is ready for assessment.
A settlement proposal has been prepared and presented to the claimant offering coverage for repair costs and associated expenses.
The customer has reviewed and accepted the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the promptness and fairness of the offer.
Following acceptance of the settlement, the claim is officially approved and prepared for disbursing the payment to the insured party.
The agreed settlement amount has been transferred to the claimant’s account to cover the vehicle repair expenses described.
With payment completed and no further issues reported, the auto accident claim is now officially closed in our system.
The record of the closed auto accident claim has been archived securely for future reference as required by company policy.
